title: 维族男人进集中营以后，政府派汉族男人与维族母女「结对认亲」，男人看着维族女儿两眼发直
contents:
via Twitter @Salih_hudayar

After locking up the men in #ConcentrationCamps and prisons, #China’s Communist Party sends  Chinese men to live with #Uyghur families under its “relatives program.”

This Chinese man tells this #Uighur woman to give her daughter to him. He states he will wait one or two years. 

当家里的男人进了再教育营，中国共产党派来汉族男人住进维吾尔族家里，实践他们的「结对认亲」计划。
这个汉族男人告诉维族女人想要她的女儿，可以等上一两年。
